explanation: [0-0] In a bedroom with a bunk bed set against a yellow, brown, and green wall, there is a family of three. The father, wearing a black shirt and blue jeans, is sitting on the floor looking at his white phone, holding a piece of bread in his right hand. The mother, in blue pajamas, is sitting on the lower bunk bed, also looking at her black phone and holding bread in her right hand. Their daughter, holding a blue phone in her right hand, is half-lying on the upper bunk bed, looking down at her parents.

[0-4] Then the daughter reaches out her left hand towards her mother, wanting to eat the bread in her hand. The mother looks up at her daughter and shakes her head in refusal. She extends her right index finger, signaling her daughter to be quiet, then puts the bread and phone on the bed.

[4-9] Immediately, the mother secretly breaks off a piece of bread from the father's hand and gives it to her daughter. Then, she picks up the bread and phone from the bed. The daughter takes the bread and eats it happily.
